title: Mastering the Markets
description: In the stock day trading world, millions of decisions must be made every second. Now imagine an AI that could perform the same tasks, eliminating exhaustive time spent.
author: Srinivas Sriram

title: AI-Solving CAPTCHAs
description: How many times have you had to fill out a CAPTCHA while signing up for anything? Bots nowadays can solve these puzzles better, on average, than human users. So what's the point?
author: Jeffery Kang

title: Matrices for Speech
description: Services like Google Translate seem to amazingly understand the meaning behind thousands of languages, contexts, and accents. But how? Through matrices.
author: Anisha Kalgi
